Author: vezt
Title: ANN [ICO] [VZT] Vezt - Blockchain-secured Music Monetization Platform
Body: Hi All,  Thanks for your patience and interest in the platform. The Vezt team is heads down developing our new app and web portal which will include a streamlined process for artists and rights holders to begin listing intellectual property for which they own a portion of the rights. As we continue consolidating our communication channels we will be updating this thread less frequently. For questions related to Vezt, platform development progress, or ISO participation please reach out to our team at support@vezt.co. Following this post, the best place to watch for updates related to Vezt will be our official website in addition to our Medium page and social media accounts.  The following aggregates our latest updates from the past month:  Hi Vezt Community,  We’ve had another busy week with our development team focused on the new website and ISO web portal. Keep an eye on our homepage for a redesigned site along with access to information on our past and upcoming ISOs.  As the week comes to a close we have some exciting updates to share: To be clear, all VZT holders who purchased VZT and are holding will be included in the bonus payouts. This does not include bounty participants. Secondly, our new web portal is very close to launching! You will soon be able to set up your Vezt account and preview some upcoming ISOs.  We have locked a date and venue for our SXSW event. Mark your calendars for March 13th and stay tuned for details on the event! Trinidad James, The “All Gold Everything” icon, joins our team as an artist and brand ambassador!  Lastly, Vezt co-founders Steve Stewart and Robert Menendez were featured in last week’s We Are LA Tech podcast! Check it out here: http://bit.ly/2sfQrEo  Also: First Medium post of 2018 with an update from Steve Stewart and Robert Menendez: https://medium.com/@vezt/vezt-distribution-dates-updates-and-highlights-3263721e211  We look forward to welcoming you all to the new web portal soon and are grateful for your continued support and interest! Again, we ask that you reach out to support@vezt.co with any questions.    -The Vezt Team

Title: ANN [ICO] [VZT] Vezt - Blockchain-secured Music Monetization Platform
Body: We do not comment on what other companies are doing (or may not be doing). Instead, we are focusing on our core mission: letting music fans share ownership with artists in their favorite songs.  Incidentally, that's not licensing a song or paying for access to listen. It's actually owning a portion of the rights to it.  Here's a little more on how it works:  Artists and rights holders choose how much they’d like to raise from a part or fraction of their song, the reversion term and set a date for the Initial Song Offering (ISO™). Rights-buyers (including fans, music professionals and brands) on Vezt, buy song rights during the ISO™, and the artists receive funds credited to their account immediately. The song rights information is encoded on Vezt’s blockchain. Song royalties are then collected from Performing Rights Organizations (“PROs”) in 137 countries around the world, as well as STEM.is, which aggregates digital performance royalties from Spotify, iTunes, YouTube, Pandora, etc. Vezt transfers those earnings back to the artists and rights-buyers, creating a new marketplace, with no limits on new and exciting music artists will create.  You can also take a look at this blog post for more details on how it works as well as our new FAQ.  Thanks for the great question! And don't forget to join our Telegram community for exclusive information and invites! https://t.me/joinchat/F_38d0NlVp_oQfB0S5u1Fg  At your service, Michael

As many of you know, Steve’s phone was compromised via a social engineering hack in the middle of the night. This led to the hacker being able to access his Telegram account, the Vezt Twitter account, as well as cause issues with the website. Fortunately, our team was quick to respond and was able to prevent any monetary damages. All funds are completely safe thanks to their security measures. Again to reiterate: no funds were lost and our wallets are fully secure. We realize such an event is frustrating, and should be dealt with the upmost seriousness. Here’s what we’ve decided to do: We’ve decided to do the responsible thing and postpone the TGE for 7–14 days in order to do a final code and security audit. Everyone who has already contributed will stay “in.” Your tokens will carry over to the new TGE. We are also adding manpower, consulting with more security experts and will have an update for you in a few days. We will be making some improvements and updates to the website all in accordance with the feedback you’ve sent us. During this time, our communications and business development team will push the Vezt story to as many channels as possible to expand our reach and also bring more attention to what the team is working on. In addition, many people have written to tell us that we should announce some big name artists and rights holders. We hear you! Rob and Steve have been working the phones and holding meetings day and night with some well-known singers and bands. We will announce these partnerships as soon as possible. We think this is the most prudent way forward to shore up our technicals and resources and then press onward and upward. We welcome all of your advice, input, and ideas. Keep ’em coming! If you have any questions, please feel free to ask! Keep tuned for more updates! We will continue to keep the communication strong with you all! At your service, Michael E. Rubin Director of Communications, Vezt michael@vezt.co"

Title: ANN [ICO] [VZT] Vezt - Blockchain-secured Music Monetization Platform
Body: Own your playlist!™  Vezt lets music fans share ownership with artists in their favorite songs!   Introducing VZT, the token that will power the platform!  The Token-Generating Event Has Begun!   VZT is now available for purchase as of November 4, 2017 at 0400 UTC as part of a Token Generating Event (TGE) open to non-US purchasers only. Please note that VZT are utility tokens for use on the Vezt platform and are not securities.  We also invite everyone to join us on Telegram for all the latest info: https://t.me/joinchat/F_38d0NlVp_oQfB0S5u1Fg   Join Our Mission to Transform the Music Industry! "We believe that music is one of the few mediums that can literally transform life. It can provide solace and comfort to those hurting or in need, joy and excitement to an experience or event, and even has the ability to transcend time and space with the emotional nostalgia that hearing a favorite song can trigger in one’s mind. It’s powerful and magic and we think it’s worthy of our efforts to provide its creators with the ability to be fairly and transparently compensated for their work and talent." - Co-founders Steve Stewart and Robert Menendez  Want to Get Involved? Subscribe to our email newsletter to get the latest news and updates Download our white paper Take a sneak peek at the Vezt app in our explainer video Join the community on Telegram Follow us on Twitter, Facebook, or LinkedIn Please visit our website at https://www.vezt.co   Watch the Co-Founders on Cheddar Watch our co-founders Steve and Robert explain Vezt in this 8:25 clip on Cheddar   How Vezt Works See Vezt in action!   Fractional song monetization for artists through Initial Song Offerings (ISO™) Social media sharing of both artist and rights-buyers activity and playlists Royalty tracking and collection in 137 countries around the world Allows fans, rights-buyers and brands to buy rights across a wide variety of songs and playlists  Vezt lets artists choose which portions of their songs to offer for sale to fans, friends, rights-buyers and brands in a monetization process called an Initial Song Offering™ (ISO). On the back-end, Vezt provides tracking and royalty collection on all ownership interests through its blockchain-based smart contract technology. Earnings are received quickly and transparently.  Here’s how an ISO works: Please see this blog post for details and infographic Artists select a song and choose the ISO date, how much of their rights to raise (ex. $10,000 for 10% of their songwriter rights), and the reversion term (3 years, 5 years, 10 year, or in perpetuity). Rights-buyers on the Vezt platform (including fans, music professionals and brands), buy the rights during the ISO. The artist receives the funds immediately. The song rights information is encoded on the Vezt blockchain and royalties are collected from both Performing Rights Organizations (“PROs”) in 137 countries around the world and STEM.is, a service which aggregates digital performance royalties from streaming services such as Spotify, iTunes, YouTube, Pandora, etc. Vezt registers the rights with PROs and digital platforms, and pays them through to artists and rights-buyers. Please see this blog post for details and infographic.   Video Testimonials  Producer Johnathan Greenaway on Vezt  Music producer / DJ Johnathan Greenaway on why he'll be putting his songs up on Vezt: "As a song they've purchased rights for becomes more successful, they reap the monetary benefits as well”  Independent Music Artist Brittney Bouchard on Vezt (click to view)  Independent Music Artist Brittney Bouchard explains why she is putting her music on Vezt: "Vezt is great because my fans can actually have part ownership in my songs."   About Vezt and the Team Vezt Inc. is a Delaware state domiciled C corporation, headquartered in Los Angeles, CA. We incorporated in early 2017, and have received pre-seed funding from venture capital ﬁrms and individual rights-buyers, including Binary Capital and Global Trust Group. We have opened ofﬁces in Los Angeles, CA and Atlanta, GA. Vezt was cofounded by Steve Stewart and Robert Menendez (see their bios under “About Us”). We have assembled a talented team of engineering and design teams with deep backgrounds in blockchain, UX/UI, and design. In addition, we have tapped a number of successful and highly experienced advisors for their expertise and input. All are working in concert to build the most robust and successful platform possible.  Meet our team and advisors!   Technical Details for Token Generating Event  Start date: November 4 at 0400 UTC ERC20 Token (Ethereum-based) Maximum hard cap of $15MM USD Tokens are issued and transferable by buyers, after completion of the TGE and token audit Escrow in an Ethereum multisig 3/4 wallet Token name: Vezt Token symbol: VZT   100% of each TGE purchaser’s VZT tokens can used on the platform to purchase song IP, after the launch of the platform Funds will be used to further software development (including back-end API and blockchain development and integration, node development and integration), international expansion, marketing/business development, legal /accounting, operational expenses and customer service costs Token allocation (estimated): 50% sold in Private & Public Token Generating Event, 35% held by Vezt Inc. for platform development, 10% reserved for partnerships, marketing & PR, etc., 5% for Advisors & Consultants    Frequently Asked Questions (Click here for our full FAQ)  What is Vezt? Vezt is a company building an app-based platform that lets artists offer percentages to the rights of their songs for sale to fans, friends, rights-buyers and brands. Vezt plans to track and collect royalty income via its blockchain-secured, app-based platform starting in Q1 2018.  What is Vezt's mission? We believe that music is one of the few mediums that can literally transform life. It can provide solace and comfort to those hurting or in need, joy and excitement to an experience or event, and even has the ability to transcend time and space with the emotional nostalgia that hearing a favorite song can trigger in one’s mind. It’s powerful and magic and we think it’s worthy of our efforts to provide its creators with the ability to be fairly and transparently compensated for their work and talent.  Our mission is: To provide artists with an equitable and transparent platform to easily and quickly monetize new or existing songs To allow fans, friends, rights-buyers and brands to partner with artists on a song-by-song basis, sharing directly in whole or fractional IP ownership To create a true marketplace for songs, where tracking and collection of royalties and licensing income is transparent and in real time To deliver to artists the opportunity to make a living from the fruits of their work, without unnecessary impediments that keep them from focusing on what truly matters - their music To strengthen the relationship between artists and those that appreciate their music, in a meaningful way, where a true partnership can be formed and mutual benefits derived  What are the problems Vezt aims to solve? Today’s music industry is fragmented, leaving most artists with few options to generate real income growth. Record labels and music publishers are only focused on a few blockbuster releases. Both developing artists and successful, established artists alike are constrained to heavily unbalanced deals that rely on antiquated protocols which lack transparency. Individual songwriters often have copyrights in numerous compositions, but have no way to directly monetize their rights, or to develop new income streams outside the traditional publishing model.  Vezt aims to provide a solution for all of this.  How does Vezt help solve these problems? Vezt lets artists choose which portions of their songs to offer for sale to fans, friends, rights-buyers and brands in a monetization process called an Initial Song Offering™ (ISO). On the back-end, Vezt provides tracking and royalty collection on participation interests through its blockchain-based smart contract technology. Earnings can be received quickly and transparently.  Who does Vezt primarily benefit? Vezt primarily benefits three groups: ARTISTS: Any artist can benefit from Vezt. With the ability to finance music creation and collect royalties without unnecessary intermediaries, music creation can become a profitable business again for the artists. RIGHTS-BUYERS: Savvy music professionals (producers, A&R, promoters, managers, etc.), institutional rights-buyers (pension funds, mutual funds, etc.), and brands can benefit from a robust song marketplace, where tracking and collection of royalties and licensing income is transparent and in real time. MUSIC FANS: United in their love for music on a meaningful level, music fans now can translate their passion into true partnership with artists on a song-by-song basis.  What is the Vezt's development roadmap and timeline? We expect to have a demonstrable prototype in September of 2017, and a fully-functional MVP by the end of Q4 2017. Q3 2017 - Complete back-end and blockchain development and integration Q4 2017 - Onboard and white-glove 3 artists through the platform, complete MVP Q1 2018 - Beta launch, add selected artists and rights-buyers, product testing and improvements Q2 2018 - Release platform to all artists and rights-buyers  Why is the Token Generating Event only open to non-US purchasers? Even though we do not believe the VZT is a security, our legal team has recommended this TGE structure to as an abundance of caution to comply with US securities laws..  What will the funds raised during the Token Generating Event be used for? Funds will be used to further software development (including back-end API and blockchain development and integration, node development and integration), international expansion, marketing and business development, legal and accounting, operational expenses and customer service costs  Please visit our website at vezt.co[/list]
